item.title: Unobserved Box (250 pts, 6 solves)
item.description: Team Name: O0027 - UND3r 20 D53 H473r5 4ND r374K3r Solved by: grhkm and Kaiziron Source of the problem: HKCERT CTF 2021 Problem Statement All codes are uncertain before the measurement, and you will never make it. Observe the code to get the flag. nc chalp.hkcert21.pwnable.hk 28132 Solution Outline We dump the binary from 0x400000 to 0x405000 using format string and %8$s, then reverse engineer the check function for the flag.
